F

getMojos() - Method in class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.PluginXml

I

InheritMojo - class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.InheritMojo.
Support mojo inheritance by merging the local plugin metadata with metadata from dependent plugins.
InheritMojo() - Constructor for class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.InheritMojo
 

M

mergeMojo(Xpp3Dom, Xpp3Dom) - Static method in class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.PluginXml
Merges a mojo descriptor with its super-mojo (inherit from it) The local mojo is considered the dominant one - if any parameters, configuration or requirements match then the local version is kept.

O

org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit - package org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit
Various classes to handle parsing and merging of plugin metadata

P

PluginSerializer - class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.PluginSerializer.
Customized XML serializer for plugin metadata
PluginSerializer() - Constructor for class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.PluginSerializer
Configures basic formatting rules
PluginXml - class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.PluginXml.
Plugin metadata, usually stored in META-INF/maven/plugin.xml
PluginXml(File) - Constructor for class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.PluginXml
Parses a file presumed to contain plugin metadata

W

write() - Method in class org.ops4j.pax.construct.inherit.PluginXml
Writes the plugin metadata back to the file where it was loaded from
